answers.answer: Hi Tigerlily,I take a direutic for high blood pressure and this makes my body lose water weight.  However, I do have to be careful and make sure that I am taking vitamins and minerals.   Direutics  tend to eliminate important minerals from the body.  Without these minerals, I would cramp.  The last post was a good idea.  Not every diet suggested is healthy or will work for every body type. We are so unique. I would suggest getting your hormone levels checked also.  A good book about the importance of hormone levels is "The Sexy Years" by Suzanne Somers.  I read it, to be informed.  I am in my early 40's.I hope this helps.  Take care.
